content: the alpine hygge beanie - the perfect soft squishy slouchy crochet hat this double-brimmed beautifully textured crochet hat will keep you warm and cozy in even the coldest weather this pattern matches a fun textured stitch alpine stitch with a simple rectangle construction making it an enjoyable project for advanced beginners or seasoned crocheters this pattern is worked from the bottom up it is written in one size adult but the sizing can be easily modified by adjusting the number of brim row hat is worked in row to create a rectangle which is then seamed - no increasing/decreasing this download includes a written pattern a chart of the stitch used and helpful pictures visit www knottednest com for the free version of this pattern pattern download - please note this listing is for a pattern only - pattern is written in us terms skill level difficulty intermediate - this pattern uses fpdc and crocheting in the blo copyright the alpine hygge beanie pattern and photographs are property of the knotted nest and are for personal non-commercial use only you may not alter share or sell this pattern in any way however you are welcome to sell the finished product you produce using this pattern please credit the knotted nest by including a link to the pattern listing if selling the finished piece online share your work follow along on instagram at @theknottednest tag me @theknottednest to show off your new hat
